starWarsQuotes.name: Obi-Wan Kenobi
quotes: You must do what you feel is right, of course.
Your eyes can deceive you. Donâ€™t trust them.
Remember... the Force will be with you, always.
These aren't the droids you're looking for.
I felt a great disturbance in the Force, as if millions of voices suddenly cried out in terror and were suddenly silenced.
You can't win, Darth. If you strike me down, I shall become more powerful than you could possibly imagine.
It's over Anakin, I have the high ground.
So uncivilised.
You were supposed to destroy the sith, not join them
That's no moon. It's a space station.

starWarsQuotes.name: Yoda
quotes: Do. Or do not. There is no try.
When nine hundred years old you reach, look as good you will not.
A Jedi uses the Force for knowledge and defense, never for attack.
Size matters not. Judge me by my size, do you?
Difficult to see. Always in motion is the future.

starWarsQuotes.name: Darth Vader
quotes: I find your lack of faith disturbing.
No. I am your father.
Impressive. Most impressive.
The Force is strong with this one
Nooooooooooooooooooooooooo
The ability to destroy a planet is insignificant next to the power of the Force.

starWarsQuotes.name: Han Solo
quotes: Never tell me the odds
Great shot, kid, that was one in a million!
Wonderful girl. Either I'm going to kill her or I'm beginning to like her.
Look, Your Worshipfulness, let's get one thing straight. I take orders from just one person: me.
Women always figure out the truth. Always.

starWarsQuotes.name: Luke Skywalker
quotes: I'll never turn to the Dark Side. You've failed, your highness. I am a Jedi, like my father before me.
I'm Luke Skywalker. I'm here to rescue you.

starWarsQuotes.name: Princess Leia Organa
quotes: Help me, Obi-Wan Kenobi. You're my only hope.
Aren't you a little short for a stormtrooper?
Someone has to save our skins. Into the garbage chute, fly boy.
Will someone get this big walking carpet out of my way?

starWarsQuotes.name: Emperor Palpatine
quotes: Your feeble skills are no match for the power of the Dark Side
Power. Unlimited Power.
Did you ever hear the tragedy of Darth Plagueis the Wise?
Do it.
